name: Socialization Processes
description: The processes by which an individual becomes a member of a particular social system (or systems). The course examines both the content of socialization (e.g., development of specific social behaviours) and the context in which it occurs (e.g., family, peer group, etc.). Material will be drawn from both social and developmental psychology.
prerequisites: PSYB10H3 and PSYB20H3 plus one C-level half-credit in PSY
